then combine the meat mixture with the

mix well and add one whole egg or just

well mix well again and set aside for

called
man Gendry India arm is very easy to

together together with a tablespoon up
and white so well to dissolve and leave

until you create a very beautiful net
this is such a fun game make sure you
keep the heat low enough just to

when it's still hot is very crispy and

to assemble the row place one heaping
tablespoons of the filling on top of a
wrapper closer to one end shape it
nicely and then rub it until you reach

both sides in bulge and continue to roll
up until the other end the moisture in
the feelings will soften the net wrapper
as you roll
so actually there's no need to dampen

wrapping technique at another angle
hit the generous amounts of vegetable

brown
the good thing about these net rappers
is that they make the rolls very crispy
but they absorbs quite a good amount of
oil and can burn very easily that's why
they are mostly used to make seafood
spring rolls because seafood cooks
faster than meat so the feelings will be
cooked as soon as the outside turn
golden brown when placing the rolls into
the oil just rotate them so the net
wrapper will clip them very beautifully
make sure you keep the heat on medium
low to avoid burning the outsides before
the fillings is coat when the spring
rolls are golden brown just remove them
and place on a rag or paper towel to
